item.title: Week in Review 2/1/13
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: Was playing with animating some stuff on a page and started trying to work with animating box-shadow. I realized it wasn’t working and after some research figured out that it just doesn’t work. A super handy and easy plugin solves that problem though. The latest episode of the Suburban Strength Coach podcast is up! Started watching the Single Page Apps with HTML5, Web API, Knockout and jQuery on Pluralsight with my team at work.
